text: Iṉi (nāṉ nimirttu vaitta) anta cuvar antap paṭṭiṉattiluḷḷa anātaic ciṟuvar iruvarukkuriyatu ataṉ aṭiyil avviruvarukkum contāmāṉa putaiyal uḷḷatu avviruvaruṭaiya tantai (sālihāṉa) nalla maṉitarāka iruntār eṉavē, avviruvarum takka pirāyamaṭainta tam'miruvariṉ putaiyalaiyum veḷippaṭutti (eṭuttuk) koḷḷa vēṇṭum eṉa um'muṭaiya iṟaivaṉ nāṭiṉāṉ. (Ivaiyellām) um iṟaivaṉuṭaiya rahmattil niṉṟum uḷḷavai eṉ viruppu, veṟuppiṉpaṭi entak kāriyattaiyum ceyyavillai etaip paṟṟi nīr poṟumaiyāka irukka muṭiyavillaiyō ataṉ viḷakkam itu tāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
